content: Everybody’s missing the real motivation for lebrons anger. The “posse” comment is a smoke screen. He’s upset with Phil because the story he was telling where he used the word painted lebron to be a diva. He was putting himself ahead of the team and trying to get him and his “business friends” to spend another night before leaving, trying to overrule erik Spoelstra. He was upset that phil was spoiling his new good guy image, so he pulled the ol black lives matter card. Rather than making it about himself he triggered all the social justice warriors. Well played, Bron Bron.
